sourcesContent:
List of Threads ({{viewTitle}} View)

Filter by:

Filtered by: {{listFilter}}

Thread Details

Thread ID: {{ thread.ThreadId }}

Thread Title: {{ thread.ThreadTitle }}

Thread Body: {{ thread.ThreadBody }}

Comments

  • Posted by: {{ comment.User.UserName }} on {{ comment.CommentCreatedAt }}

    {{ comment.CommentBody }}

  • Home
  • Threads
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import {TThread} from './threads'; @Component({ selector: 'app-thread', templateUrl: './threads.component.html', //styleUrls: ['./threads.component.css'] }) export class ThreadsComponent implements OnInit { viewTitle: string = 'Table'; listFilter: string = ''; thread: TThread = new thread(); userId: string = ''; //Initialize user Id userIsAdmin: boolean = false; // and userIsAdmin constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.userId = ''; // Fetch the current user's ID this.userIsAdmin = false; // Check if the user is an admin // Fetch thread details this.http.get('api/threads/threadId').subscribe((thread) => { this.thread = thread; }); } // Function to add a comment addComment() { // Logic to add a comment } // Function to edit a comment editComment(commentId: number) { // Logic to edit a comment } // Function to delete a comment deleteComment(commentId: number) { // Logic to delete a comment } }
